org.raistlic.common.precondition

Class Precondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.precondition.Precondition

  • public final class Precondition
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is used as the entry point for precondition checks, it has utility methods for validation work, as well as some static factory methods that expose proper AssertionFactory instances for different types of objects.
    Since:
    1.2

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setParameterExceptionMapper

        public static void setParameterExceptionMapper(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> exceptionMapper)
        The method sets a mapper for parameter checks for creating exception from String message when needed.
        Parameters:
        exceptionMapper - the exception mapper to set, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception of the currently configured exception type for parameter checks failure when exceptionMapper is null.

      • setContextExceptionMapper

        public static void setContextExceptionMapper(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> exceptionMapper)
        The method sets a mapper for context checks for creating exception from String message when needed.
        Parameters:
        exceptionMapper - the exception mapper to set, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception of the currently configured exception type for parameter checks failure when exceptionMapper is null. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • setExpectedCasesStrategy

        public static void setExpectedCasesStrategy(AssertionFactory.Strategy strategy)
        The method sets the strategy of how expectation instances are managed in the AssertionFactory used for the checks. This sets the given strategy to both parameter and context checks.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the strategy to set, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception of the currently configured exception type for parameter checks failure when strategy is null. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • setParameterExpectedCasesStrategy

        public static void setParameterExpectedCasesStrategy(AssertionFactory.Strategy strategy)
        Sets the strategy of how expectation instances are managed in the AssertionFactory used for parameter checks .
        Parameters:
        strategy - the strategy to set, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception configured for parameter check failures when strategy is null. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • setContextExpectedCasesStrategy

        public static void setContextExpectedCasesStrategy(AssertionFactory.Strategy strategy)
        Sets the strategy of how expectation instances are managed in the AssertionFactory used for context checks.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the strategy to set, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception configured for parameter check failures when strategy is null. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • switchOn

        public static void switchOn()
        Turns on both parameter and context checks.

      • switchParameterCheckOn

        public static void switchParameterCheckOn()
        Turns on the parameter checks.

      • switchContextCheckOn

        public static void switchContextCheckOn()
        Turns on the context checks.

      • switchOff

        public static void switchOff()
        Turns off both parameter and context checks. See also switchOn().

      • switchParameterCheckOff

        public static void switchParameterCheckOff()
        Turns off the parameter checks, so that they won't throw exception regardless of whether the expectation matches. See also switchParameterCheckOn().

      • switchContextCheckOff

        public static void switchContextCheckOff()
        Turns off the context checks, so that they won't throw exception regardless of whether the expectation matches. See also switchContextCheckOn().

        public static <E> GenericAssertion<E> param(E parameter)
        Returns a generic expectation instance for checking the specified parameter .
        Type Parameters:
        E - the actual type of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter to be checked.
        Returns:
        the generic expectation instance. See also GenericAssertion .

      • assertParam

        public static void assertParam(boolean statement)
        Makes an assertion about the parameter, throws appropriate exception when the specified statement is false.
        Parameters:
        statement - the assertion statement that's claimed to be true.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception of the currently configured exception type for parameter checks failure when statement is false. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • assertParam

        public static void assertParam(boolean statement,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Makes an assertion about the parameter, throws appropriate exception with the specified message when statement is false.
        Parameters:
        statement - the assertion statement that's claimed to be true.
        message - the message for exception when statement is false.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - or an exception of the currently configured exception type for parameter checks failure when statement is false. See also setParameterExceptionMapper(Function).

      • context

        public static BooleanAssertion context(java.lang.Boolean contextState)
        Returns an expectation for checking the specified Boolean contextState .
        Parameters:
        contextState - the Boolean context state to be checked.
        Returns:
        a Boolean expectation instance. See also BooleanAssertion .

      • context

        public static <N extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<N>> NumberAssertion<N> context(N contextState)
        Returns an expectation instance for checking the specified contextState .
        Type Parameters:
        N - the actual Number sub-type of the contextState .
        Parameters:
        contextState - the context state to be checked.
        Returns:
        a number expectation instance. See also NumberAssertion .

      • assertContext

        public static void assertContext(boolean statement)
        Makes an assertion about the context, throws appropriate exception when statement is false.
        Parameters:
        statement - the asserted statement that is claimed to be true.
        Throws:
        InvalidContextException - or an exception of the configured type when statement is false. See also setContextExceptionMapper(Function).

      • assertContext

        public static void assertContext(boolean statement,
                                 java.lang.String message)
        Makes an assertion about the context, throws appropriate exception with the specified message when statement is false.
        Parameters:
        statement - the asserted statement that is claimed to be true.
        message - the message for exception when statement is false.
        Throws:
        InvalidContextException - or an exception of the configured type when statement is false. See also setContextExceptionMapper(Function).

      • currentThread

        public static ThreadAssertion currentThread()
        Returns an expectation instance for checking the current thread.
        Returns:
        the ThreadAssertion for current thread.

      • isInEventDispatchThread

        public static void isInEventDispatchThread()
        The method checks that the current thread is the Swing event dispatch thread, or otherwise throws an exception.
